planning.serves: 4 as a starter or 2 as a main course

ingredients.item: 2 roasted chicken breasts, skinned and shredded

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a pan, and fry the lardons for 2-3 minutes. Add the carrot and salad onions, and fry for a further 1-2 minutes.

Stir in the rice, then add the stock, bay leaves and tomatoes. Bring to the boil and simmer gently for 10 minutes. Add the chicken and cook for a further 5 minutes or until the rice is tender. Remove the bay leaves and stir in the coriander.
